content: this is an english pdf download not finished products granny square motif widely adopted in crocheting beautiful bags clothes hats is simple for beginners to start their crocheting journey funincloud s simple but pretty granny square patterns is easy for you to crochet your bags or hats or cardigans the pattern includes -pdf files with detailed explanations and some pictures to help you along -level intermediate -the pattern is available in english us terms terms the pattern and images contained in this document belong to yui from funincloud this pattern is for personal use only it may not be copied，translated，resold，or otherwise redistributed in any way without the author s permission finished objects made from this pattern may be sold in small quantities，as long as you credit funincloud as the original designer and use your own photos to represent your work purchase this pattern will be ready to download immediately after the payment you will see the download link in details of your order return policy instant download items don t accept returns exchanges or cancellations please contact us about any problems before you place your order if you find any difficulties in crocheting please feel free to contact us enjoy happiness with your crochet time
